pages.title: Cosmos Enriching Catalyst
pages.text: Resource needed:$(li)[Advanced Crafting table]$(li2)x21 Astroid Block$(li2)$(l:waters/water)x8 Aqua Catalyst$(li2)x8 Space Suit Upgrade$(li2)$(l:waters/weak_enriching)x4 Weak Enriching Catalyst$(li2)$(l:waters/undergarden_enriching)x4 Undergarden Enriching Catalyst$(li2)$(l:waters/nether_enriching)x4 Nether Enriching Catalyst
After crafting, This Catalyst can be used to generate Cosmos Enriching Water by Throwing it in Nether Enriching Water

pages.name: Cosmos Enriching Water
pages.text: Resources obtained by:$(li)Dropping:$(li2)Blank Nuggets$(li2)Blank Pebbles$(li2)Blank Dust$(li2)Blank Gem$(li2)Any Ingot
